1090.name: AlMg 3 Tig
1090.Applications: Suitable for base metals with maximum 3% Mg. These alloys are suitable for a big range of applications in the construction sector, in general, and in the structural industry. Widely used in ship and vessel building.
1090.Suitable_For: Aluminium alloys: AlMg Mn, AlMg 3Mn, AlMg1, AlMg2, AlMg2,7Mn, AlMg3, AlMg3,5, AlMgSi0,5, AlMgSi0,8, G-AlMg3Si, 3.3315, 3.3535, 3.3206, 3.3541, EN AW 5005A, EN AW 5754, EN AW 6060, EN AC 51100, EN AW 5454, EN AW 5251
